a.title: Age : A duration of time during which an organism (or a process) has existed.

vertical-align: top; text-align : left; background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px
vertical-align: top; text-align : left; background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px

tr.td:
A duration of time during which an organism (or a process) has existed
+ There SHALL be a code if there is a value and it SHALL be an expression of time. If system is present, it SHALL be UCUM. If value is present, it SHALL be positive.
Elements defined in Ancestors: id, extension, value, comparator, unit, system, code

short.value: A duration of time during which an organism (or a process) has existed

definition.value: A duration of time during which an organism (or a process) has existed.

human.value: There SHALL be a code if there is a value and it SHALL be an expression of time. If system is present, it SHALL be UCUM. If value is present, it SHALL be positive.

expression.value: (code or value.empty()) and (system.empty() or system = %ucum) and (value.empty() or value > 0)

xpath.value: (f:code or not(f:value)) and (not(exists(f:system)) or f:system/@value='http://unitsofmeasure.org') and (not(f:value/@value) or f:value/@value >=0)
